name: Riederhof
description:
A new established holiday apartment in quiet situation 
with a beautiful view over the ziller valley and his mountain world.
Reduction for children on inquiry. 
short stay possible - surcharge on inquiry.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, separate toilet and shower/bathtub, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description:
1 dreamlike generously equipped living area with kitchen
and Satan's end and level TV with access to the balcony.
Electric oven with field Ceran and baking pipe, chill freezer.
Water cooker and coffeemaker. Chimney stove if requested by the host is heated.
Bedclothes, towels are put.

The flat lies in the 2nd floor and is approx. 78 m Â² with big balcony.
2 bedrooms in each case with double bed and single bed, one with balcony exit. The reeds court Lying in Ramsau in the Zillertal at 1000-metre sea in the mountain Rams.
The Gerlosstein valley station only 2. 5 km are removed from the house and can be reached by own car comfortably:
To the local centre with the next shopping possibilities these are only 5 km.
Entrance about small mountain road of Hippach Ramsau (5 km). In winter snowy chains necessarily.
